tips.accept: If hot patching is used for fix, the hot patch will be automatically applied upon reboot after acceptance. If not checked, it will become invalid upon reboot
tips.compilation: Only for the kernel: After applying the hot patch, the latest cold patch will be synchronously installed. If the compilation fails, it will automatically accept the hot patch
tips.noteOne: 1. Cold and hot patches will be split into two tasks to be executed separately
tips.noteThree: 3. After the cold patch task is completed, it needs to be restarted to take effect
tips.noteTwo: 2. On the same host, the hot patch task must be executed before the cold patch repair task
